clock_pin.docs:
**, [Pin Schema](https://esphome.io/guides/configuration-types.html#config-pin-schema)**: The pin which CLK is connected to.

*See also: [bp1658cj Component/Hub](https://esphome.io/components/output/bp1658cj.html#configuration-variables)*

data_pin.docs:
**, [Pin Schema](https://esphome.io/guides/configuration-types.html#config-pin-schema)**: The pin used for DATA.

*See also: [bp1658cj Component/Hub](https://esphome.io/components/output/bp1658cj.html#configuration-variables)*

id.docs:
**, [ID](https://esphome.io/guides/configuration-types.html#config-id)**: The id to use for this `bp1658cj` component. Use this if you have multiple BP1658CJ chains connected at the same time.

*See also: [bp1658cj Component/Hub](https://esphome.io/components/output/bp1658cj.html#configuration-variables)*

max_power_color_channels.docs:
**, int 0-15**: Adjusts the current supplied to the color channels, higher is more power.  Default is 4 per BP1658CJ datasheet. See table below.

*See also: [bp1658cj Component/Hub](https://esphome.io/components/output/bp1658cj.html#configuration-variables)*

max_power_white_channels.docs:
**, int 0-15**: Adjusts the current supplied to the white channels, higher is more power.  Default is 6 per BP1658CJ datasheet. See table below.

*See also: [bp1658cj Component/Hub](https://esphome.io/components/output/bp1658cj.html#configuration-variables)*

bp1658cj_id.docs:
**, [ID](https://esphome.io/guides/configuration-types.html#config-id)**: Manually specify the ID of the [Component/Hub](https://esphome.io/components/output/bp1658cj.html#bp1658cj-component). Use this if you have multiple BP1658CJ chains you want to use at the same time.

*See also: [bp1658cj Output](https://esphome.io/components/output/bp1658cj.html#id1)*

channel.docs:
**, int**: Chose the channel of the BP1658CJ chain of this output component.

*See also: [bp1658cj Output](https://esphome.io/components/output/bp1658cj.html#id1)*

id.docs:
**, [ID](https://esphome.io/guides/configuration-types.html#config-id)**: The id to use for this output component.

*See also: [bp1658cj Output](https://esphome.io/components/output/bp1658cj.html#id1)*
